object.summary: Memory leak in glibc-2.11.3-17.95.2 when resolving a non-existing DNSBL entry using getaddrinfo()

object.reproducer:
Simple reproducing program is in [1]. Note that performance drop was not possible to observe on systems with "too many" CPUs [2] (and [3]). 4 CPUs (physical or virtual) were recommended.
[1] https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=975930#c0 [2] https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=975930#c37 [3] https://bugzilla.suse.com/show_bug.cgi?id=975930#c26
object.summary: Customer reports performance drop between SLE11 SP4 and SLE12 SP0 in multithreaded application -- it was demonstrated by simple multithreaded test (and partially affected by MALLOC_ARENA_MAX environment settings). They pointed that upstream glibc version doesn't have such degradation.
